author: Dean Bennett
title: Jason Kenney says there’s 'a special place in hell’ for hoarders, scammers during pandemic - The Globe and Mail
description: Jason Kenney says there’s 'a special place in hell’ for hoarders, scammers during pandemic The Globe and Mail Five charts showing the spread of COVID-19 in Alberta and Canada CTV News Oil and gas companies taking steps to keep employees safe from COVID-19 Glo…
content:
Alberta Premier Jason Kenney updates media on measures taken to help with COVID-19, in Edmonton on March 20, 2020. Kenney says officials are continuing to hear about cases of hoarding food and other vital supplies.
JASON FRANSON/The Canadian Press
